item.title: Bird Flu Patient Dies From Rare Strain
item.description: Older adult male was the first confirmed human case of H5N5 variant globally. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Perioperative Pembro + Enfortumab With Vedotin Okayed for MIBC
item.description: New combination extends event-free and overall survival beyond surgery alone in muscle invasive bladder cancer. Medscape Medical News
